text: TRANSACTION COORDINATION If our DBMS supports multi-operation and distributed txns, we need a way to coordinate their execution in the system. Two different approaches: — Centralized: Global "traffic cop". — Decentralized: Nodes organize themselves. | S2CMU-DB X s$ » Pl @ 10151/11350 8 & JV e 22 - Introduction to Distributed Databases (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
